story_alola_01_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: There, there. That’s a good Pokémon.
story_alola_01_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hmm... I didn’t expect there to be so many
lost Pokémon...
story_alola_01_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Odd, isn’t it? And we can’t seem to find
their Trainers either...
story_alola_01_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Why don’t you come hang with the outcasts, yo?
story_alola_01_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: We’ve got plenty on our plate already...
story_alola_01_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
We still have to find whoever stole intel on
the Ultra Beasts and Ultra Wormholes from the
Aether Foundation.
